question: Which among the following has played an important role in the transition from open-ranch to the organised ranch in US?
explanation:
Fencing of land has played an important role in the transition from open-ranch to the organised ranch in US.
While, on the one hand, it puts a check on interlopers from grazing extra cattle on the ranch, on the other, it also prevents the herds from wandering and inter-breeding with poor animals.
